divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my cousin kellyn were outside in her backyard gardening and she sawsomething in the sky. at first I thought it was a plane but it got bigger andglowed brightly. we got scared and ran into the house. we then ran back outsidewith more witnesses and it was still there but they didnt find it i the sky.the object was suacer shaped and glowed brightly. eventuly it gained altituteand disappeared
